pageProps.content:
# Pea and Ham Soup

Serves: 8

## Ingredients

* 0.5kg pork/ham
* 1 onion
* 1 cup frozen veg
* 250g green split peas
* 1 litre water (try 0.8 next time)

## Method

1. Fry onion, veg, garlic and oil
2. put all in pressure cooker
3. cook 2hr

## Notes
